name: Flame Dragon Wyrmling
description: A medium-sized dragon with a fierce temperament, embodying chaotic evil tendencies and exhibiting natural abilities.
memorable: Its Heated Body ability burns those who come too close, and its fire breath can devastate multiple foes at once.
goals: To assert dominance and cause chaos through intimidation and fiery attacks.
relations: Often encountered alongside other wyrmlings or older dragons; may serve more powerful dragons.
environment: Typically found in volcanic or fire-prone regions where it can thrive.
strengths: Resistance to fire damage and ability to deal both physical and fire damage through attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to targets that can withstand or counteract fire damage; relatively low physical strength.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and fire damage, and a fire breath attack that covers a wide area.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which unleashes devastating fire attack in a cone, affecting multiple enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet and has a passive Perception of 15.
skills: Skilled in Deception and Persuasion, making it adept in social interactions.
additional_information: High Charisma makes it potential for manipulation.
Uses agility to ambush opponents effectively.
Capable of flight, supporting ranged combat tactics.
test_queries: chaotic evil wyrmling that attacks with fire
agile dragon lurking in volcanic areas
fast creature with heated body ability
dragon skilled in deception and persuasion
